text: HEK293T cells grown in 6 - well plates ( Nunc , Waltham , MA , USA ) were cotransfected with 5 µg of pMyc - eEF1A and 3 µg of [UNK] - NS5A using an X - tremeGENE HP DNA transfection reagent ( catalog no . 06366236001 ; Roche , Penzberg , Germany ) according to the manufacturer ' s instructions . Briefly , the cells were transfected with 400 µL of serum - free DMEM containing 8 µg of plasmids and 12 µL of X - tremeGENE HP DNA transfection reagent . At 6 h post - transfection ( hpt ) , the transfection mixture was replaced with DMEM supplemented with 10 % FBS and incubated for an additional 48 h before being assayed .
